titleStmt.title: A vindication of The character of a popish successor, in a reply to two pretended ansvvers to it by the author of the character.
titleStmt.author: Settle, Elkanah, 1648-1724.
Phillips, John, 1631-1706.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Elkanah Settle. Cf. NUC pre-1956.

Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
